block.p: WEXLER-Betty. Of New York City and Bal Harbour, FL. Beloved wife of the late Harry Wexler. Adored and loving mother of Lois, Robert, Ginger and the late Paulette. Cherished Grandma to Heidi and Jeni. Loving sister to Shirley Nitkin and Nate Musicant, both of California. Rest in peace beautiful lady. We will all miss you. You will remain with us forever. Service Wednesday, October 11th, 12:45PM at The Riverside, 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
